title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go          Ohio's National Park Service Sites  If you're in Ohio and you have a few days to spare after your visit to William Howard Taft NHS and the Cincinnati area, consider visiting Ohio's other national park sites.  Ohio has eight total National Park Service sites with three of them located within 100 minutes from William Howard Taft NHS.  Learn more about Ohio's national parks and experience your national parks in Ohio!
